title: The Directorate's Clampdown
outcome: The Directorate, alarmed by escalating unrest, launches "Operation Reset": a harsh crackdown eliminating dissent by purging opposing factions and analog activists. Oksana Lintz discovers a hidden system flaw planted by Halden, and quietly prepares for a citywide sabotage while the Council restores strict BCI control. Citizens lose hard-won freedoms—until a mysterious blackout hints at sabotage and hope.

events.description: The Directorate initiates Operation Reset, detaining key Innovator and Harmonist members and banning analog communications. Night raids target trusted activists distributing flyers and coded signals.
Oksana Lintz discovers hidden automation protocols linked to Halden's terminal, suggesting a built-in kill switch for the BCI but requiring immense risk to activate.
The BCI is forcibly recalibrated, erasing Tribunal-era scores from user records. Citizens' public profiles are wiped of protest history, and privileges for 'trusted' individuals are restored.

A sudden, unexplained citywide blackout strikes central Stenograd. Critical BCI functions cease, transit halts, and Council officials scramble. Rumors of sabotage spread as glimmers of organized resistance emerge.
